wikipedia_page.main: John Dawson Eccles, 2nd Viscount Eccles,  (born 20 April 1931), is a British Conservative peer and businessman. He is one of the ninety hereditary peers elected to remain in the House of Lords after the passing of the House of Lords Act 1999.

response: *  1931   – John Eccles, 2nd Viscount Eccles, English businessman and politician
